issue.title: [C++] Add benchmark for number parsing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3099](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3099). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Number parsing will become important once we have a CSV reader (or possibly other text-based formats). We should add benchmarks for the internal conversion routines.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3099?focusedCommentId=16588700) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2456
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2456>
